column14: I first got this product in one of those beauty sample subscriptions. I have since ordered every color, but the Viola is by far my favorite. It glides on easily, the color is amazing, and it lasts forever even with eating, drinking, and mask wearing. Doesn‚Äôt creep into the wrinkles around my mouth. column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2022
column14: It‚Äôs a darker shade with a main brown nude color with a bit of a pink red undertone in it as well. Definitely need to wear it with a full face of makeup. Not a natural color. The pencil glides the color on very smoothly and it stays ok and doesn‚Äôt get on your mask or anything since it‚Äôs matte. It came with a sharpener so you can sharpen it. It‚Äôs a good and pretty sharpener with two holes the smaller one you can use for your lip liners! :) This one was $11 all together not too bad. Some other sugar shades are more pricey. Hope this review helps. I bought this because I wanted to try a dark bold color and see how that would look on me. Def stands out.
